To access and download from raw data repository, visit:

https://www.github.com/mikeod38/dauergut.git

Alternatively, to clone this repository in terminal paste the following:

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
git clone https://github.com/mikeod38/dauergut.git
```

To load and access package functions and script using Rstudio:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("mikeod38/dauergut")
```

All raw data is in the "extdata" folder


**Figures from this website are for illustrative purposes only, please view the full manuscript on bioRXiv**
